name: Strange Game Ambient Loops
description:
Strange Game Ambient Loops library is a meticulously designed & game ready ambience loop library created to help you make stunning and immersive audio environments quickly. Great for horror, fantasy, adventure, 3D, 2D mobile app games, motion graphics, film and audio productions. With over 3 hours of game locations, tension, dark moods, you’ll be well equipped to create the perfect feel and soundscape that brings your production to life.

  • 186 game ambience loops
  • 2.23 GB of samples
  • All in 44k 16bit .wav

All royalty-free and inspired by popular MMORPG games. Invent new worlds in audio with immersive atmospheres and rich tones from this one of a kind set of seamlessly loop-able files that your audience will love. Of course, it’s ready to use in any multi-media production. All of the recordings are royalty-free, RTU-OTB and delivered in pristine 44kHz/16bit .WAV files so you get the best quality for further sound editing, pitch shifting, and effects processing should you wish to do so.

Constructive Modular Loop Layers - Build How You Want It

With a selection of 186 designed horror & fantasy loops, you’ll be able to create new worlds effortlessly. The library is structured to get you all the layers of a full loop so you have maximum control of your desired sound aesthetic. Most loops come with the following variations: Full, Layer A, Layer B, & Layer C. The layers make up the full version of the loop. As a result, you’ll be able to create stronger continuity across your production. For example, if the full version has too much going on, then try using the layer versions for a simpler setting.

Designed Ambience Loops For Games

Includes sounds for settings scenes like Sacred Temple, Hell Spawn, Dark Streets, Afterlife, Haunted World, Eclipse, Hidden Realm, Haunted Forest, Hell Woods, Alien Factory, Shock Therapy, Searching Wasteland, Frozen, Eerie Caves, Chaos, Empty Crypt, Apocalyptic Wind, Sewer System, Nuclear, Decay, AI Uprising, Fire Chasm, Hell & Dreamscapes. Great for video games, film, tv, fantasy productions, MMORPG, sci-fi, horror, podcasts, radio, and DJ sound effects too. Really, any audio production that needs background sound effects and scene setting ambient tones, Strange Game Ambient Loops has got you covered. 

UCS Compliant & Soundminer Metadata 

All sound effects labeling is UCS compliant & is organized into categories to make it easier to navigate with understandable folder structures: Eerie, Ethereal, Forest, Industrial, Seaside, Synthetic, Tonal, Tundra, & Underground.  On top of UCS, Strange Game Ambient Loops features extensive metadata embedded in the files using soundminer metadata to help you find the right sound at the right time as well.

Product details:

  • 186 game ambience loops
  • 2.23 GB of samples
  • All in 44k 16bit .wav
  • 3 hours & 30 mins of sound
  • Designed & Modular Game Ambience Loop Library
  • Includes embedded Soundminer metadata
  • UCS Compliant
  • Eerie - 48 loops
  • Ethereal - 29 loops
  • Forest - 12 loops
  • Industrial - 30 loops
  • Seaside - 10 loops
  • Synthetic - 13 loops
  • Tonal - 15 loops
  • Tundra - 12 loops
  • Underground - 17 loops
  • All sound effects are youtube friendly & royalty free
  • RTU-OTB (Ready to be used out of the box)
